na ɔahyew Keriot ahemfi no; na Moab dze weɔɔweɔɔyɛ

column2: "na mubotwa no mu atsɛmbufo efi hɔ
column3: na mekuku n’asafohemfo nyina aka no ho

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Juda n’emumuyɛ do ntaataa ntsi
column3: merenndan ne ntsea no; osiandɛ wɔapow EWURADZE ne mbra
column5: na hɔn atorsɛm a hɔn egyanom dzii ekyir no ama wɔafomfom:"

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Israel n’emumuyɛ ntaataado ntsi
column3: merenndan ne ntsea no; osiandɛ wɔatɔn ɔtseneneenyi agye dwɛɛtɛɛ

column2: "hɔn a hɔn enyi ber ohianyi n’etsifi huntuma kakra no mpo
column3: na wɔkyea ɔbrɛfo no kwan: na banyin na n’egya kɔ akataasia kor ho
column4: dze gu me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho fi:"

column2: "na wɔda ahoba tam do wɔ afɔrmbukyia nkyɛnmu
column3: na wɔnom hɔn a wɔabɔ hɔn kaw no nsa wɔ hɔn Nyankopɔn fie."

column2: "Naaso mesɛɛ hɔn enyim Amorinyi a ne tsentsen tse dɛ odum atsentsen
column3: na no ho yɛ dzen dɛ esudur no
column4: na mesɛɛ no nduadzewa wɔ sor
column5: na no ndwow so wɔ ase."

column2: "Eso emi na medze hom fii Egypt asaase do firii
column3: na midzii hom enyim mfe eduanan wɔ sar no do

column2: "Na memaa hom mba binom do hyɛɛ hɔn nkɔnhyɛfo
column3: na hom mberantsɛ no binom meyɛɛ hɔn Nazirifo. Ao Israelmba
column4: aso nnyɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ara bi nye no? EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Na mbom hom maa Nazirifo nsa ma wɔnomee; na hom hyɛɛ nkɔnhyɛfo no dɛ

column3: mobɔhom hom do wɔ hom bea hɔ
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hwiir a efiefi ahyɛ no ma no ɔhom adze do."

column3: na ɔhoɔdzennyi rennhyɛ n’ahoɔdzen mu dzen

column2: "eso nyia okitsa egyen no rinngyina; na nyia n’anan ho yɛ har no renngye noho: eso nyia ɔtse pɔnkɔ do no ɔrenngye noho:"
"na nyia ɔwɔ akokodur wɔ akatakyi no mu no mpo no
column3: ɔdze adagyaw boguan wɔ da no mu
